thread.section_title: NYLO New York City - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ultra satisfied guest
thread.title_full: Ultra satisfied guest - Review of NYLO New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: heywardc2017
title: Ultra satisfied guest
text: The facilities are excellent and the location and value is great. Every hotel employee we came in contact with was great and really aimed to please. The room was great and attractive and the lobby and public spaces are really cool, as is the lovably bar. I would gladly recommend this hotel to anyone I know traveling to New York City whether for tourism or business. The lobby restaurant "Sarafina" serves excellent Italian food, including great Pizza.
